Ok, wow all of you need to slow down and quit letting the establishments manipulation of a tragic story divide you. I can not disagree with the intended sarcasm of the original poster . That statememt should draw attention to the fact that we need unity to fight the establishments attempts to divide and disarm us. Those of you saying we have too much class to do stupid things in the face of a tragedy are dead wrong. This entire stream of comments only proves that. We may not riot but almost every white person in this conversation can be rightly accused of stiring the shit unnecessarily. If we truly had class that behavior would simpily not be acceptable. Jonathan Osterman I understand your anger, and I can empathize with you. However you can not let your anger rule you. Your initial comment was in its self very racist, and no amount of justified anger qualifies the continuation of something as terrible as racism. """"Kyle, you're an ignorant white redneck who hates Obama and hates black people. Get the fuck out of here with your dumb ass redneck logic."""" What we all need to remember, what we all can agree on is that this conversation constituted a win for the establishment up to this point. Every one was playing their intended part exactally. We the people do need the media to report events, but we can not allow their manipulation of the truth to divide us because from day one that is how the maintained control over us. I simply ask that every one take a moment and think is this what I really want, or is it what """"THEY"""" want?
